thread.section_title: Mercure Paris Levallois Perret - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Levallois-Perret, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Overall really pleasant
thread.title_full: Overall really pleasant - Review of Mercure Paris Levallois Perret, Levallois-Perret, France - TripAdvisor

author: Lynda F
title: Overall really pleasant
text: Hotel is fresh, bright, clean and comfortable. Reception staff were super helpful and friendly. I had requested gluten free breakfast which was not available on the first day but they did get some gf bread for my second morning. Overall breakfast was disappointing compared to other Mercure Hotels I've stayed in. It is a small boutique hotel so perhaps this is why? The breakfasts in the Ibis in Issy les Moulineaux are significantly better.
